task.summary: Create project base construction added: Main - java: + Controllers + Models + Repositories + Services Resources: + mainPortal + researchPortal + testPortal + messages resource bundle
Added new dependency to Maven: pom.xml + starter-thymeleaf + starter-security + thymeleaf-extras-springsecurity3 (version: 2.1.1.RELEASE)

Setup base login system and 'Hello world' display
Added: + Permission + Role + homepage.html + messages.properties
+ Added roles (with include a list of permissions) to the User class
Mapping of /homepage to mainPortal/homepage.html /homepage is the base login page and start page (root: /)

Added users Quinten and Tester Made user Dries administrator
Added: + User Quinten (admin) + User tester (user)

Development of users.html for user management.
Added: + UsersController.java + users.html + navbar entry + Homepage Hello greeting
